content:
HealthStateFilter HealthStateFilter Enum

In this Article

Edit

Enumerates filters for parameters of type HealthState. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

Syntax

Declaration

[Flags]
public enum HealthStateFilter : long<Flags>
Public Enum HealthStateFilter As Long

Fields

All
All

Filter that matches any HealthState.
Default
Default

Default value. Depending on usage, may match any HealthState or none.
Error
Error

Filter that matches input with value Error.
None
None

Filter that doesnâ€™t match any HealthStateFilter. Used in order to return no results on a given collection of states.
Ok
Ok

Filter that matches input with value Ok.
Warning
Warning

Filter that matches input with value Warning.

Attributes

System.FlagsAttribute

Details

Namespace

System.Fabric.Health

Assembly

System.Fabric.dll
